The photos were published in a Facebook: 2019, which has been shared almost 500 times.
The post: s Bengali-language caption translates to English as: "CPM's great procession against the misrule of Yogi government in Lucknow, the capital of Uttar Pradesh. Paid media of BJP will not show you this."
The photos were taken by reputable news: Bloomberg, and Reuters, and were published on their respective websites with captions describing the Hong Kong protests.
